extDescription.message: summarize text content with LLM Api, api/prompt customization, lightweight, no sub/service,  pure extension, no privacy worries

Auto_open_summary_panel_on_new_tab.message: Auto open summary panel on new tab

Auto_begin_summary_by_action_or_context_.message: Auto begin summary when triggered by action or context menu
when summary panel is opened by action trigger or context menu trigger(all except floating ball or auto-open), auto begin summary

cut_preserve_front_DESC.message: Split the content, keeping the first half with the maximum length.

cut_preserve_end_DESC.message: Split the content, keeping the second half with the maximum length.

cut_preserve_middle_DESC.message: Split the content into 3 parts, with the middle part of maximum length beging preserved, front and end sides are equally divided.

max_content_length_DESC.message: limit the max length of the webpage content text

max_content_length_CALC_INFO.message:
ðŸ’¡calculate by javascript String.length

max_content_length_TOKENIZER_INFO.message:
1.The token calculation method varies greatly between different models,
making it impossible to use a single model for accurate calculation 
2.token calculation duration is too large, 
3.tokenizer lib will lead to a large package size.

Custom_css_variables_DESC.message: custom css settings to modify the style, if defined, it will be injected.

Welcome_Intro.message: Thank you for installing. Here are basic usages:

image_error_hint.message: Image cannot be viewed? Please try viewing the tutorial from github

open_webpage_click_sum.message: 2. open a webpage, click floating ball to open panel, click "sum" button

Export_if_with_apiKeys.message: export with apiKeys?(Default no apiKeys included)

Export_if_with_apiKeys_Alert.message: your credential will be inlcuded in the export file.

Commad_Open_Panel_DESC.message: open/hide summary panel in current page
